overview: An outlaw couple known as the Ryder Dies are on the run and at large. In addition to wreaking havoc through the state of California, the now-infamous duo have become a source of public fascination and, in some areas, intense obsession. Detective Cassandra Banks is among the obsessed -- her hardcore determination to catch these criminals and close their case has transformed from purely professional to something significantly more sexual . . . will she be able to contain her composure when she gets her hands on these filthy felons?
title: Fuck Forever
